articles.title: Is American Express (AXP) Overpriced After Its Recent Steady Share Price Climb?
articles.mainIdea: Is American Express (AXP) Overpriced After Its Recent Steady Share Price Climb?
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Is American Express (AXP) Overpriced After Its Recent Steady Share Price Climb?. American Express (AXP) has quietly outperformed the broader market over the past year, and that kind of steady climb tends to get investors asking whether the stock still offers attractive upside from here. See our latest analysis for American Express. With the share price now around $380.85 and a strong 30 day share price return alongside an impressive five year total shareholder return, American Express still looks like it has meaningful momentum behind it rather than fatigue.
